title: Unearthing the hidden links: Investigating the functional connectivity between amygdala subregions and brain networks in bipolar disorder through resting-state fMRI
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Adnan Alahmadi, Ashjan G. Alali, Bayan M. Alzhrani, Reema S. Alzhrani, Walaa Alsharif, Shrooq Aldahery, Duaa Banaja, Njoud Aldusary, Jamaan Alghamdi, Ibrahem H. Kanbayti, Norah Y. Hakami
